mapper.select: select saqal.id, saqal.type, sc.name typeName, saqal.title, saqal.url, saqal.content, saqal.remark, saqal.is_deleted, saqal.created_by, saqal.created_time, saqal.modified_by, saqal.modified_time, saqal.sequence from sys_app_question_answer_library saqal left join sys_code sc on sc.is_deleted = 0 and saqal.type = sc.value where saqal.id = #{id} and saqal.is_deleted = 0
